name: confusion
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.
flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.
